con:testCase.name: setAllHeaders

con:request.name: Create recurring
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateRecurringChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <recurringChargeTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_REC1" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_REC1"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <!--Optional:--> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test ${#ticket}</description> </languageDescriptions> <calendar>MONTHLY</calendar> <subscriptionProrata>true</subscriptionProrata> <terminationProrata>true</terminationProrata> <applyInAdvance>true</applyInAdvance> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <ratingUnitDescription>1</ratingUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> </recurringChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateRecurringChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create subscription
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateOneShotChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <oneShotChargeTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_OS1" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_OS1"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <!--Optional:--> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test 685</description> </languageDescriptions> <!--Optional:--> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <ratingUnitDescription>1</ratingUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> <oneShotChargeTemplateType>SUBSCRIPTION</oneShotChargeTemplateType> <!--Optional:--> <immediateInvoicing>false</immediateInvoicing> </oneShotChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateOneShotChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateUsageChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <usageChargeTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_USAGE1" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_USAGE1"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <!--Optional:--> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test 685</description> </languageDescriptions> <!--Optional:--> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <ratingUnitDescription>1</ratingUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <unitMultiplicator>1</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> <!--Optional:--> <filterParam1>MANA</filterParam1> <!--Optional:--> <filterParam2></filterParam2> <!--Optional:--> <filterParam3></filterParam3> <!--Optional:--> <filterParam4></filterParam4> <!--Optional:--> <filterExpression></filterExpression> <priority>1</priority> </usageChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateUsageChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create service
con:request.con:request: MONTHLY ${#TestSuite#ticket}_REC1 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_OS1 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_USAGE1

con:request.name: Create service 2
con:request.con:request: MONTHLY ${#TestSuite#ticket}_REC1 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_OS1 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_USAGE1

con:request.name: Create offer
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateOfferTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <offerTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_OFFER1" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_OFFER1"> <disabled>false</disabled> <offerServiceTemplates> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <offerServiceTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <serviceTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_SERVICE1"> </serviceTemplate> <mandatory>true</mandatory> </offerServiceTemplate> <offerServiceTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <serviceTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_SERVICE2"> </serviceTemplate> <mandatory>true</mandatory> </offerServiceTemplate> </offerServiceTemplates> </offerTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateOfferTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateOfferTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <offerTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_OFFER2" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_OFFER1"> <disabled>false</disabled> <!--Optional:--> <offerServiceTemplates> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <offerServiceTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <serviceTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_SERVICE3"> </serviceTemplate> <mandatory>true</mandatory> </offerServiceTemplate> </offerServiceTemplates> </offerTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateOfferTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Create mediation import file

con:request.name: Create BR
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:create> <!--Optional:--> <jobInstance jobTemplate="BillingRunJob" code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_BR1" description="BillingRunJob"> <jobCategory>INVOICING</jobCategory> <customFields> <customField code="BillingRunJob_billingCycle" description="billingCycle"> <stringValue>CYC_INV_MT_1</stringValue> </customField> <customField code="BillingRunJob_invoiceDate" description="invoiceDate"> <dateValue>${#TestSuite#invoice_date}</dateValue> </customField> <customField code="BillingRunJob_lastTransactionDate" description="lastTransactionDate"> <dateValue>${#TestSuite#last_tx_date}</dateValue> </customField> </customFields> </jobInstance> </ws:create> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Create a ddrequest state operation (Menu->Payments)
con:testStep.con:description: Create a ddrequest state operation (Menu->Payments) From=2015-07-01 To=2015-12-30 File Format=SEPA

con:testStep.name: Check customerAccount->accountOperations tab
con:testStep.con:description: There must be an accountOperation of type=Invoice created with debit=718.5200.

con:request.name: create_commercial_invoice
con:request.con:request: AGGREGATED 2015-12-12 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_Invoice_TEST-Type ${#TestSuite#ticket}_BA 2015-12-12 10 10 10 No CONSUMPTION ${#TestSuite#ticket}_UA CONSUMPTION 1 120.121.21.2 10 1 10 10 10 10 CMP_DATA 2015-12-12 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 ${#TestSuite#ticket}_RT ${#TestSuite#ticket}_OS1 Yes

con:testStep.name: Create a ddrequest state operation (Menu->Payments)
con:testStep.con:description: Create a ddrequest state operation (Menu->Payments) From=2015-07-01 To=2015-12-30

con:testStep.name: Check customerAccount->accountOperations tab
con:testStep.con:description: There must be an accountOperation of type=Invoice created with debit=173.0300.

con:request.name: Create Timer
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createTimer>\r <timerEntity code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_${#TestSuite#index}_Timer" description="Timer" hour="10" minute="9" second="8" year="2018" month="12" dayOfMonth="22" dayOfWeek="4">\r </timerEntity>\r </ws:createTimer>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.token: <timerEntity code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_${#TestSuite#index}_Timer" description="Timer" hour="10" minute="9" second="8" year="2018" month="12" dayOfMonth="22" dayOfWeek="4"/>

con:request.name: Update Timer
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:updateTimer>\r <timerEntity code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_${#TestSuite#index}_Timer" description="Timer2" hour="11" minute="19" second="18" year="2019" month="13" dayOfMonth="23" dayOfWeek="5"> </timerEntity> </ws:updateTimer>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.token: <timerEntity code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_${#TestSuite#index}_Timer" description="Timer2" hour="11" minute="19" second="18" year="2019" month="13" dayOfMonth="23" dayOfWeek="5"/>
